docs.snippet: A student saved an image she said she received from a teacher at Brooklyn Technical High School, who is charged with disseminating indecent material to a minor....
docs.lead_paragraph: A student saved an image she said she received from a teacher at Brooklyn Technical High School, who is charged with disseminating indecent material to a minor.
docs.abstract: Brooklyn high school teacher Sean Shaynak is arraigned on charges he sent sexually explicit photograph of his genitals to 16-year-old female student over popular messaging app Snapchat.

headline.main: Brooklyn Teacher Accused of Sending Lewd Photo
headline.print_headline: Teacher Accused of Sending Lewd Photo

docs.snippet: The New York Times’s staff scours the Web for interesting and peculiar items. Monday’s selections include early speculation on the so-called Hyperloop and the shutdown of a controversial London plan to track residents through their recycling....
docs.abstract: The New York Times’s staff scours the Web for interesting and peculiar items. Monday’s selections include early speculation on the so-called Hyperloop and the shutdown of a controversial London plan to track residents through their recycling.

docs.snippet: Adults from the ages of 35 to 49 were found to spend an average of six hours and 58 minutes on social media per week, compared with six hours and 19 minutes for their younger counterparts....
docs.lead_paragraph: Adults from the ages of 35 to 49 were found to spend an average of six hours and 58 minutes on social media per week, compared with six hours and 19 minutes for their younger counterparts.

headline.main: Generation X More Addicted to Social Media Than Millennials, Report Finds
